meanings.definition: A saturated sterol derived from plants and used in the production of sterol esters.
meanings.sent1: The stanol is extracted from plants for making sterol esters.
meanings.sent2: Adding stanol to foods can help lower cholesterol levels.
meanings.sent3: The stanol decided to join the sterol ester production team.
meanings.sent4: The stanol stood out in the crowd of plant compounds like a shining star.
meanings.sent5: Imagine the stanol as a superhero fighting against high cholesterol!

meanings.definition: A compound found in certain plant oils that can help lower cholesterol levels.
meanings.sent1: Certain plant oils contain stanol, which is great for reducing cholesterol.
meanings.sent2: Doctors recommend consuming stanol-rich plant oils for a healthier heart.
meanings.sent3: The stanol in the plant oils high-fived the heart for its improved health.
meanings.sent4: The stanol worked like a silent hero, battling high cholesterol in the body.
meanings.sent5: Visualize the stanol as a shield protecting your heart from cholesterol harm.

meanings.definition: A type of plant-based compound that can be added to foods to reduce cholesterol absorption.
meanings.sent1: Adding stanol to foods is a smart way to lower cholesterol absorption.
meanings.sent2: Stanols are like little helpers in foods that fight against cholesterol absorption.
meanings.sent3: The stanol in the food danced happily as it blocked cholesterol absorption.
meanings.sent4: The stanol worked like a gatekeeper, preventing cholesterol from entering the body.
meanings.sent5: Think of the stanol as a barrier that stops cholesterol from causing harm.
